jexer.help

Class Topic

  • java.lang.Object
    • jexer.help.Topic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Topic>

    public class Topic
extends Object
implements Comparable<Topic>
    A Topic is a page of help text with a title and possibly links to other Topics.
